name: NoteLog
description: NoteLog provides a facility to write notes into a handout named `Log`. You can use the `!note-log <text>` command to write a bulleted line of text to the `Log` handout.  You can use the `!note-text [{{] block of text [}}]` command to write an entire block of text to the `Log` handout preserving linebreaks.  You can insert linebreaks in the chat by typing _shift-enter_.  Both commands will expand inline rolls.
